summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Fourth Avenue North, Dexter Avenue and Nickerson Street, being a continuous street, from the north margin of Fulton Street to the east margin of Third Avenue North all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 65947, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
